content.rendered:
Directed by Alex Holmes. John Strickland.

Written by David Macpherson. David Macpherson. Matthew Jacobs Morgan. Meg Salter.

Cast Iain Glen (Magnus). Molly Vevers (Heather). Abraham Popoola (Easter). Rochenda Sandall (Cat Braithwaite). Martin Compston (Fulmer). Owen Teale (Hutton). Stuart McQuarrie (Murchison). Calvin Demba (Baz). Richard Pepple (Dunlin). Cameron Fulton (Garrow). Neshla Caplan (Kacey). Mark Addy (Coake). Nikhil Parmar (Harish). Emun Elliott (Leck). Neila Stephens (Charlie Crio). Mark Bonnar (Alwyn). Zach Gerard (Helicopter Pilot). Steven Barr (Roughneck). Dougie Rankin (Drill Operator). Kathryn Mulholland (Oil Rigger)

Language English.

Producers Matt Brown. David Macpherson. Suzanne Reid. John Strickland. Derek Wax. Samantha Winter.

Production Wild Mercury Productions.

No. of Seasons 2

No. of Episodes 7

Status OnGoing (2023–)
